}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "FriendlyElec", "NanoPi R4SE" and "2205" are silk-screened on both sides of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 @2.0GHz Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) :+ @1.4GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC) Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power Source: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C)
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R4SE ''NanoPi R4SE'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/07/24/nanopi-r4se-dual-gigabit-ethernet-router-32gb-emmc-flash/ ''NanoPi R4SE dual Gigabit Ethernet router adds 32GB eMMC flash'' on '''CNX|Software''']
